page.title: 12Lea Valley Park 2
page.content:
The Clayton Hill Country Park (GR 387 058) provides a picnic area in addition to a well signposted country walk over the open Parkland area which will provide people with the opportunity to observe a great variety of wildlife. In some instances guided walks are led throughout the year and at a variety of locations, points of interest are explained along the way.
The area comprising Keysers Estate is predominantly housing with the odd shop found on Old Nazeing Road. The area is located NW of Lower Nazeing and is relatively close to Broxbourne Lido and the Railway Station. This particular part of the area also contained five public parks as well as some factories making kitchen items such as sinks and cookers.
